item.title: Full lunar eclipse creates rare super blood Moon
item.description: Its hue was created by sunlight being projected through the Earth's atmosphere onto the Moon.

item.title: GCSE and A-level exam invigilator shortages mean parents and teachers are stepping in
item.description: A union is warning of invigilator shortages as pupils sit their first summer exams since 2019.
